item.title: Cara Install HiveOS
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Download Image Hive OS Download Image Hive OS{:target=”_blank”} dan pilih image di bagian GPU, karena kita akan melakukan mining lewat Graphic Card. Install Flasher Image Balena Etcher Download dan install Balena Etcher{:target=”_blank”} untuk melakukan flash image ke Flashdisk / HDD / SSD. Login dan Buat Farm di Akun HiveOS Anda perlu akun HiveOS untuk membuat farm mining. Setelah login, klik ikon + pada kanan atas dashboard web HiveOS untuk menambahkan Farm.

item.title: Mining Overclock Settings
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Ethereum (ETH) Red Panda Mining's setup: Power Limit: 100 Temp Limit: 83 Core Clock: -502 Memory Clock: +1300 Fan Speed: 60 My custom setting: Power Limit: 76 Temp Limit: 73 Core Clock: -502 Memory Clock: +1300 Fan Speed: 60 Ergo (ERG) Red Panda Mining's setup: Power Limit: 45 Temp Limit: 68 Core Clock: +0 Memory Clock: +0 Fan Speed: 80 Or reset afterburner to stock, on t-rex miner, add --lock-cclock 1520 and run as administrator.

item.title: Mengidentifikasi Device ID Graphic Card Nvidia RTX Series Versi Non LHR
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: RTX 30XX old Series v.1 Non-LHR Original RTX 30XX Series (non-LHR): GeForce RTX 3090 - GA102-300 (PCI Device ID: 2204) GeForce RTX 3080 - GA102-200 (PCI Device ID: 2206) GeForce RTX 3070 - GA104-300 (PCI Device ID: 2484) GeForce RTX 3060 Ti - GA104-200 (PCI Device ID: 2486) GeForce RTX 3060 - GA106-300 (PCI Device ID: 2503) RTX 30XX new Series v.2 LHR New RTX 30XX Series (LHR):

item.title: Mining Crypto dari Smart Phone Android
item.author: Larry Marzan Jr.
item.description: Mining Crypto dari Smart Phone Android Download Termux on your Android Smartphone Install Andronix Go to unmineable.com and Use RandomX for start mining from your phone Sumber: youtube.com - How To Mine Crypto On Android [Full Guide 2021]{:target=”_blank”}
